title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: When exporting a zip file, the checkboxes should use a busy cursor during the update process.
OB: Currently, there is no indication that the checkboxes are being updated during the export process.
EB: The checkboxes should display a busy cursor or some other indication of activity while they are being updated.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Go to the Export Zip option.
3. Select all the projects.
4. Choose the file types you want to include.
5. Press 'OK' to start the export process.
